messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]flashlight making was Re: Sunday SCHOOL
messages.msgSnippet: ... Apparently we just need D size batteries little flashlight bulbs and wire to connect it. I have been advised on another list it would be safer with
messages.messageBody:
> Sheila asked:
> How do you make flashlights?
>

Apparently we just need 'D' size batteries little flashlight bulbs and wire
to connect it. I have been advised on another list it would be safer with
special wires from radio shack with alligator clips. OK so then we put a
toilet paper tube around this contraption and tape it on with strong tape
and write something like "Let There Be Light" on the tp tube so that it has
something remotely to do with Church!
I am also one who gets told off for my groups getting a bit rowdy and having
too much fun as someone else mentioned :-D.
PS if you are reading this Shyrley you will have to help me teach SS when
you visit *grin*. I've gotten a couple of my best ss ideas from non
Christians!

Jodi
aim: catsndogs4us
